entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Stettler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stettler 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -9.2°C
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
